item.title: CRISP-DM and why you should know about it
item.description:
The Cross Industry Standard Process for Data Mining (CRISP-DM) was a concept developed 20 years ago now. I’ve read about it in various data mining and related books and it’s come in very handy over the years. In this post, I’ll outline what the model is and why you should know about it, even if it has that terribly out of vogue phrase data mining in it! ðŸ˜‰

Data / R people. Do you know what the CRISP-DM model is?

— Steph Locke (@SteffLocke) January 8, 2017
